elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Propose a compromise for the conflicting objectives that takes appropriate account of the concerns of both stakeholder groups.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Many visitors wish to smoke indoors. The health of its employees and guests is important to the organizer.
elements.correctAnswer: The organizer could set up smoking areas.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: The organizers want to sell as many drinks as possible, while the city wants to have to dispose of as little waste as possible for cost and environmental reasons.
elements.correctAnswer: The organizer could only sell recycled bottles.
